ygData.subject: Re: Role-playing element in EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: Another advantage Dark Elf has over Gnomes/Erudites it that they are respected in their city. You save a lot of money during the initial stages by using a Dark
ygData.messageBody:
Another advantage Dark Elf has over Gnomes/Erudites it that they are respected
in their city. You save a lot of money during the initial stages by using a Dark
Elf.

Hide is also very useful. See a "holier than thou" paladin coming your way?
HIDE!!!

Train of orcs coming towards you? Hide again.

But, as hide is a racial skill for Dark Elf Necros, it becomes less useful as
you levle up.

"Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:

> From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
> i dont mind being a bad guy as long as i can find company... but i think fer
> a start... its better to improve ya relationship with other races... i dont
> think i want the entire town KOS whenever... wherever i visit... btw... if
> they keep coming up to u... i.e., KOS... then how can u ever improve ya
> faction? think thats gonna be a hard task.... although the gnome has better
> stats... than the dark elf... but i think... in terms of stats critical to
> Necro... Dark Elf is slightly better...in fact... i think comparable to
> Erudite... as i tried to create both on paper... n Dark Elf got the
> advantage of Hide n Ultravision... :) maybe i need more research as regards
> to Erudite n Dark Elf...
>
> till then...
> Fred
> ----- Original Message -----

> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Role-playing element in EQ
>
> > From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
> >
> > Aye i'm intending to improve my faction not for the sake of good, but
> rather
> > to fool the pale skinned beings, whom many of you call humans into
> believing
> > I am fighting for their cause. However, I am loyal only to Innoruuk
> himself
> > and for that, I say HAIL INNORUUK. Seeing the humans die shall always be
> my
> > joy, however i always welcome another ally in Evil.----->Mondain )
> > ooc Although the gnomish necro has the best stats, I chose dark elf after
> > seeing a fully equipped Tier'dal necro wearing full Gossmer armor, not
> sure
> > of the spelling who looked really nice . I saw many gnomish warriors wear
> > armor and they look kinda stumpy hehe.
> > btw, the human guards in commons won't attack, neither do the guards in
> > freeport, they are evil. I got a dubious con on most of them, but those
> with
> > SIR, u better watch out. They are the self proclaimed paladins and are
> fools
> > imho. Innkeepers in commons are KOS to us tho, so if u plan on coming
> > commons, don't go near them. They are better martial arts expert than the
> > guards.
> > Any yes, if possible i would like to wipe out a goody town when i'm very
> > high level. imagine seeing the bodies of those pale skin beings lying on
> the
> > floor in a bloody heap. Yummy )
